items.sentence: Tom was only thirteen years old when he came to Boston.
Tom was sitting on a wall and looking out at the ocean.
Don\'t forget to take the medicine the doctor gave you.
Don\'t you think Cookie would be a good name for a dog?
Tom couldn\'t remember what they\'d been talking about.
Tom found out Mary was stealing from the cash register.
Tom and I want to talk to Mary alone for a few minutes.
You don\'t have to say anything you don\'t want to say.
Get me a tube of toothpaste while you\'re at the store.
We don\'t want anything like that to ever happen again.
